title: Erigon node will randomly stop syncing  after a bad block hash
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

erigon version 2.30.0-stable-35f493c5

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 22.04.1

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon unwinds and fixes itself with no problem.
#### Actual behaviour

Erigon will attempt to unwind itself but then it never starts syncing again. Its almost like its silently stuck. 

#### Steps to reproduce the behavior
I am just running the node normally with these arguments:
--datadir /data3/mainnet  --authrpc.jwtsecret=/data3/mainnet/jwt.hex --http --http.api "eth,erigon,ots" --http.corsdomain "*" --authrpc.addr localhost --authrpc.port 8551 --authrpc.vhosts localhost --externalcl --metrics

